meanings.definition: One who engages in theological study or discussion.
meanings.sent1: The theologizer enjoyed debating religious topics with friends.
meanings.sent2: The theologizer attended a theology class every week.
meanings.sent3: The theologizer joked that their favorite hobby was arguing about the meaning of life.
meanings.sent4: In the world of ideas, the theologizer was a skilled navigator.
meanings.sent5: The theologizer's passion for theology was as bright as a shining star.

meanings.definition: To engage in theological study or discussion.
meanings.sent1: She would often theologize late into the night, pondering the mysteries of the universe.
meanings.sent2: He decided to theologize with his classmates about the nature of divinity.
meanings.sent3: The cat theologized with the dog about the existence of a higher power.
meanings.sent4: Her mind theologized like a well-oiled machine, constantly analyzing religious texts.
meanings.sent5: The group theologized together, seeking answers to life's biggest questions.
